title: Highlighting the funniest moments, this startup aims to bring public meetings into the TikTok era
description: “This is, I think, the sixth time [I’ve] come here,” the woman’s public comment to the Corpus Christi City Council begins. She is wearing a full-body cockroach costume, antennae and all. “Last time, I brought you a bag of dead roaches. Some of you were offended, so this time, I’m bringing you a live one.”...
